articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Biden marks Veterans Day with trip to Arlington National Cemetery - 13WHAM-TV
articles.description: President Joe Biden said America's veterans are "the steel spine of this nation" as he marked Veterans Day during a visit to Arlington National Cemetery.
articles.content:
ARLINGTON, Va. (AP) President Joe Biden said America's veterans are "the steel spine of this nation" as he marked Veterans Day during a visit to Arlington National Cemetery.
